item.title: No title
item.description: UX designers is rapidly growing. Although the term “User Experience” has been used already in the ‘90s by Donald Norman it is still a young field in design, which many people have a problem identifying what it really does. UX Monkey writes about prototyping tools for UX designers and shares some sites, books and other resources for you to get to know User Experience a bit more. If you want to know what UX is all about and how to design perfect apps, sites and interactive products that match the expectation of the user —  Dig in and start learning!
